0871A46B.Toast: A man in a gibbet pleads for freedom.

1F9E611D.Phase62Description: I've found a prisoner of the bandits held in the Onyx Watchtower. He has asked me to retrieve the key to unlock his gibbet from the bandits outside.

30DC76D6.Phase10Description: I was able to find the key to Nizaar's gibbet. I should return to the Onyx Watchtower and free him.

36AC1DDC.Callback51Header: Retrieve the gibbet key from the bandits

5690A71C.Phase16Description: Nizaar and I now head for Borza's Hideout to confront the man who imprisoned him.

C3B68EF9.Phase13Description: I've freed Nizaar, but It looks as if the time in that gibbet has not been kind to him. He asked me to give him a healing potion for his wounds.

D29F0719.Callback12Header: Give Nizaar one of your Healing Potions

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: I've found a prisoner of the bandits held in the Onyx Watchtower. He has asked me to retrieve the key to unlock his gibbet from the bandits outside.

E2223B19.Phase22Description: Nizaar wants vengeance on Borza, the man who put him in the gibbet. First however, he needs a weapon to fight with.

E96ABF3F.Phase19Description: I've freed Nizaar, but It looks as if the time in that gibbet has not been kind to him.
